name: play-ts-cucumber
description: Playwright Cucumber TS framework - The easiest way to learn

scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' npm run test:command && npm run posttest
scripts.test:tag: npm run pretest && NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' npm run test:tag:command && npm run posttest
scripts.posttest: npx ts-node src/helper/report/customiseReport.ts && npx ts-node src/helper/report/report.ts

author: NCS
